springBlog.title: Blog Application - Spring Boot
springBlog.shortDescription: Secure Spring Boot web application featuring JWT authentication, user management, and article creation capabilities
springBlog.fullDescription: A comprehensive Spring Boot web application demonstrating modern security practices and user management. Features include secure authentication using JWT tokens, role-based access control, and a clean RESTful API architecture.
technical: Structured project architecture following best practices

mantiqPlatform.title: Mantiq Platform - AI-Powered Sales Dashboard
mantiqPlatform.shortDescription: A modern, intelligent sales management platform that leverages AI to enhance sales operations, analytics, and decision-making processes.
mantiqPlatform.fullDescription: A modern, intelligent sales management platform that leverages AI to enhance sales operations, analytics, and decision-making processes. The platform integrates advanced AI technologies to provide comprehensive sales insights, automate workflows, and optimize business performance.
features: Interactive Dashboard with Real-time Sales Metrics
technologies: Nivo Charts for Advanced Data Visualization

1.title: AI Guardian Drone
1.shortDescription: Advanced AI-powered drone for search and rescue operations
1.fullDescription: An intelligent drone system utilizing computer vision and machine learning algorithms to enhance search and rescue capabilities. The project integrates real-time object detection, thermal imaging, and path optimization to improve emergency intervention efficiency.

2.title: Aircraft Damage Detection
2.shortDescription: YOLOv8-based AI system for aircraft damage assessment
2.fullDescription: Implemented a state-of-the-art object detection model using YOLOv8 to automatically identify and classify aircraft surface damages. The system provides precise localization and severity assessment of structural imperfections, reducing manual inspection time and improving maintenance efficiency.

3.title: AquaCare IoT System
3.shortDescription: Smart water quality monitoring and prediction platform
3.fullDescription: Created an IoT-based water quality monitoring system that uses machine learning algorithms to predict water contamination levels. The project integrates sensor data, real-time analytics, and predictive modeling to provide early warnings and comprehensive water health insights.

4.title: AI Diagnostic Assistant
4.shortDescription: Machine learning-powered medical diagnosis support system
4.fullDescription: Developed an AI-powered diagnostic assistant that helps healthcare professionals in making accurate diagnoses. The system analyzes patient symptoms, medical history, and test results using advanced machine learning algorithms to suggest potential diagnoses and treatment plans.

5.title: Laravel Students Management System
5.shortDescription: Comprehensive student notes and modules management web application
5.fullDescription: A robust Laravel-based web application designed for educational institutions to manage student information, modules, and grades. Features include user authentication, role-based access control, student and module management, and grade tracking. The system provides a clean, intuitive interface for administrators, teachers, and students.

6.title: Real-Time Object Detection
6.shortDescription: Real-time object detection using OpenCV and SSD MobileNet
6.fullDescription: Implemented a comprehensive object detection system using OpenCV and machine learning techniques. The project demonstrates advanced computer vision skills, including image processing, feature extraction, and real-time object recognition across various scenarios.

7.title: E-Sporter: E-Sport Management App
7.fullDescription: A sophisticated desktop application for managing esports tournaments, team performance, and player statistics. The app provides tools for tournament organization, match scheduling, team management, and performance analytics.

8.title: Graph Algorithms
8.shortDescription: Comprehensive exploration of shortest path algorithms in weighted graphs
8.fullDescription: A comprehensive project demonstrating implementation of Dijkstra and Bellman-Ford shortest path algorithms. The project includes algorithm visualization, performance analysis, and practical applications in network routing and path finding.

9.title: Medical Clinic Management App
9.shortDescription: Comprehensive medical practice management application with MVC architecture
9.fullDescription: A comprehensive web application for medical clinics to manage patient records, appointments, medical histories, and administrative tasks. The system provides secure, efficient, and user-friendly solutions for healthcare management.

10.title: Caesar Cipher Encryption Tool
10.shortDescription: Console-based message encryption and decryption application
10.fullDescription: A cryptography project implementing secure message encryption techniques. The application demonstrates advanced encryption algorithms, secure communication principles, and practical cryptographic techniques.

11.title: Takuzu Puzzle Solver
11.fullDescription: An advanced puzzle-solving application that uses sophisticated algorithms to solve Takuzu (Binairo) puzzles. The project demonstrates logical reasoning, constraint satisfaction, and algorithmic problem-solving techniques.

12.title: Tomato E-Commerce Java Application
12.shortDescription: Desktop e-commerce application for managing product sales and inventory
12.fullDescription: A comprehensive Java-based e-commerce application specializing in tomato products. The platform includes features like product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, and order management.

13.title: Online Shop Products API
13.shortDescription: RESTful API for managing and retrieving online shop product information
13.fullDescription: A robust RESTful API designed for managing online product catalogs, supporting e-commerce platforms with efficient product information retrieval, creation, and management.

14.title: Spring Boot Blog Application
14.shortDescription: Secure blog platform with user authentication and content management
14.fullDescription: A comprehensive Spring Boot web application demonstrating modern security practices and user management. Features include secure JWT authentication, role-based access control, and a clean RESTful API architecture.

15.title: Mantiq AI Sales Platform
15.shortDescription: Advanced sales analytics and visualization platform using React and AI
15.fullDescription: An intelligent sales platform leveraging AI technologies to provide comprehensive sales insights, automate workflows, and optimize business performance through advanced data visualization and predictive analytics.
